name: DAWN: Day Or Night
description:
One day you are woken up by the sounds of war, what would you do to survive it? 

Here you can play a tactics game where you create a team of civilians and survivors, in a city that without a warning becomes a battlefield. It is in your hands the survival of your units and to decide which ones you will take with you in the path to safety or leave behind. 

  • Turn Based Tactics Combat.
  • Form your team with different units and classes, recruit different survivors.
  • Manage your survivors with limited items and resources, don’t let them die.
  • A war narrative from the point of view of civilians.
